name: Quartz's Quest
description:
This is an early test release. The game is mostly done except for some polish here and there. This will be updated with any bug fixes along with a fancy manual with a more elegant story, and hopefully even a physical release if there is interest! 

Any comments or helpful notes are greatly appreciated. Thanks for playing!

Story--------------------------------------- 

 Your are Quartz the Dragon and an evil Troll Sorcerer has kidnapped your beloved Knight! Travel to The Goblin Valley where the villain keeps his tower and rescue your dear Hero! The Sorcerer's tower requires three magic keys to enter. The keys are kept by the monstrous inhabitants of the valley, but the more you collect, the more desperate the enemies will become...

Controls------------------------------------ 

Joystick: Move/Select Enemy

Button 1: Search/Confirm 

 Button 2: Status/Exit 

 Button 3: Tail Whip

Button 4: Magic Breath 

Items---------------------------------------

 Food: Restores Health 

 Potions: Restores Magic 

 Feathers: Warps to the Goblin Village, the entrance to the dungeon, or leave combat 

 Gems: Specialized breath attacks. Greater gems will attack all enemies but cost more magic. 

 Weapons and Armor: The best weapons are automatically equipped when bought or found.
